metadata.publisher: U.S. Department of Education, Office for Civil Rights
metadata.description: The CRDC collects data from all public schools and districts on student enrollment, access to courses and programs, and school climate factors. Data is disaggregated by race, ethnicity, sex, disability (IDEA and Section 504), and English Learner status.
notes: IDEA = Individuals with Disabilities Education Act - students with IEPs
Section 504 = Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act - students with 504 plans (separate from IDEA)
b_ prefix = both genders, m_ = male, f_ = female in raw API
Dis = IDEA disability, DIS5 = Section 504 disability in raw API
2019-20 was skipped due to COVID-19; 2020-21 is the most recent available in this API
The 2021-22 CRDC has been collected but data not yet available in this API as of Feb 2026

discipline.note: Rate comparison: IDEA vs non-IDEA students for same discipline actions

course_access.note: IDEA students comprise ~14% of enrollment but significantly less of advanced courses
